description:
Because of the betrayal of the Azai Clan, Nobunaga’s forces are being attacked from the front and back. Hideyoshi, Hanbee and Chidori stay behind to act as the rearguard. However, the ones who were leading the pursuit on the Oda forces were two of the Asakura Clan’s most renowned commanders.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Now Is the Time to Withdraw!
